name: Wilmer Pickering Hale & Dorr
overview: Wilmer Cutler Pickering Hale and Dorr LLP offers legal advisory services to aviation, energy, financial services, information technology, manufacturing, software, telecommunications, and life sciences industries. The firmâ€™s practice areas include corporate law, intellectual property, litigation, securities, antitrust and competition, corporate, environmental, bankruptcy and commercial, FDA, international arbitration, trade, financial institutions, labor, tax, and real estate. Its clientele includes Akamai Technologies, America Online, Bayer, Bear Stearns, Boeing, Bose, Citigroup, Credit Suisse First Boston, DaimlerChrysler, J.P. Morgan Chase, Lehman Brothers, Morgan Stanley, and Verizon Communications. Wilmer Cutler Pickering Hale and Dorr was founded in 2004 through the merger of Hale and Dorr LLP and Wilmer Cutler Pickering LLP. The firm is based in Washington, D.C. with additional offices in Baltimore, Maryland; Boston, Massachusetts; Reston, Virginia; New York City; Princeton, New Jersey; Germany; London; and Munich.
